name: The happy network
description:
Warning: Without being NSFW, this game features mature and heavy subjects. Proceed with caution.

Your sister was kidnapped and the police has no clues of what might have happened. Searching for an answer inside her computer, you find that she is a fervent user of a new website: "The Happy Network". Being a talended hacker, you decide to dig into this affair...

Click on the nodes to hack them and get informations. You will need hacking points to do this, which are increasing over time the more you get nodes. You can click on the nodes again to reread the texts.

Made for the Trijam 161: All is connected. Around 3h for the game but 5h for the story.

Music: https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/creepy

Scifi UI sprite: https://pngtree.com/so/sci-fi-user-interface

Materials: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/metals/yughues-free-...
